summary: WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AND BEARING SLIGHT LEFT, MY VEHICLE LOST POWER STEERING. I THE MESSAGE SCREEN READ, " SERVICE POWER STEERING", AND THE CENTER CONSOLE INTERACTIVE SCREEN WENT COMPLETELY BLACK. THIS LASTED NO MORE THAN 3-5SEC. EVERYTHING RETURNED TO NORMAL AND I WAS ABLE TO PROCEED WITHOUT INCIDENT. NO SIGN OF ANYTHING LEAKING FROM UNDER MY VEHICLE AS I INSPECTED IN LATER IN THE EVENING.
